price: Ṣé ẹ kò wòye pé, dájúdájú Allāhu rọ ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ohunkóhun tó wà nínú ilẹ̀ fún yín, Ó sì pé àwọn ìkẹ́ Rẹ̀ fún yín ní gban̄gba àti ní kọ̀rọ̀? Ó sì wà nínú àwọn ènìyàn ẹni tó ń jiyàn nípa Allāhu láì ní ìmọ̀ (al-Ƙur’ān) àti ìmọ̀nà (nínú sunnah Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a -) àti tírà (onímọ̀-ẹ̀sìn) tó ń tan ìmọ́lẹ̀ (sí ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀sìn).
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَأَسۡبَغَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعَمَهُۥ ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَبَاطِنَةٗۗ وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alam taraw anna al-laha sakhara lakum mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-asbagha ʿalaykum niʿamahu ẓāhiratan wabāṭinatan wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min walā hudan walā kitābin munīrin
